title: The Draymond Green Show - Game 4 Recap: Steph Curry Went God-Mode
itunes:title: The Draymond Green Show - Game 4 Recap: Steph Curry Went God-Mode
description:
Draymond Green breaks down Game 4 of the NBA Finals including Steph Curry’s incredible performance, Klay Thompson’s table-setting, Jordan Poole’s scoring, Andrew Wiggins’ defense and rebounding, and how they were able to hold Jayson Tatum and Jaylen Brown to inefficient games. #Herd

Produced by: Jackson Safon

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
